alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 11:08PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow will continue tonight prior to tapering Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, locally higher. * WHERE...Southwest Utah, Western Millard and Juab Counties and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, heavy at times, is expected to continue into the morning hours. This will make travel difficult, especially along the the I-15 corridor, into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Sanpete Valley; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties
